trans-unit.source: Specifies how the list changed.

Used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs> class to indicate the way an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> object changes.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzato dal <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs>classe per indicare il modo in cui un <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>modifiche dell'oggetto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType%2A>

trans-unit.source: An item added to the list.
<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex*> contains the index of the item that was added.
To be added.
An item changed in the list.
<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex*> contains the index of the item that was changed.
To be added.
An item deleted from the list.
<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex*> contains the index of the item that was deleted.
To be added.
An item moved within the list.

<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.OldIndex*> contains the previous index for the item, whereas <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex*> contains the new index for the item.
trans-unit.target: <>*> contiene l'indice precedente per l'elemento, mentre <> </> *> contiene il nuovo indice per l'elemento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> was added, which changed the schema.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> è stato aggiunto, quale modificato lo schema.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> was changed, which changed the schema.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> è stato modificato, quale modificato lo schema.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> was deleted, which changed the schema.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> è stato eliminato, quale modificato lo schema.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Much of the list has changed.
trans-unit.target: La maggior parte dell'elenco è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: Any listening controls should refresh all their data from the list.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i controlli di ascolto è necessario aggiornare tutti i dati dall'elenco.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
